https://registrar.umd.edu/faculty-staff/: Diploma Services | Candidate Clearance Online Candidate Clearance Online is used to clear undergraduate students for the degree or certificate. Access to Candidate Clearance Online is granted to university staff who clear undergraduate students for graduation. If you need access to this system, your supervisor should contact Diploma Services at [diploma@umd.edu](mailto:diploma@umd.edu) with the following information: Your name - Your UID - Your UMD email address - The college that houses the programs that you will be clearing -
